---
title: "Variables found within files"
output: 
  html_document: 
    highlight: default
    theme: spacelab
params:
  files: "no files"
  res: "no match"
---

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
# print results from files
purrr::walk2(params$files, params$res, function(x, y) {
  a <- paste("####", " ", x, "\n")
  cat(a)
  b <- paste(unlist(y), "\n")
  cat(b)
  cat("\n")
})
```
